properties.name: signaturePadStyleObject
properties.description: Styles which is will be applying to signature pad

properties.name: showSaveButton
properties.description: Show save button on signature pad

events.name: empty
events.description: Emitted when is save or clear buttons pressed, will return isEmpty status of signature pad

events.name: save
events.description: Emitted when is save button pressed, will return signature pad data value
